forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain this evening, with showers continuing overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain developing after midnight. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain after midnight. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
